channel.title: Awesome Coderz Team.the ACT
channel.description:
[center][u][b]Awesome Coderz Team![/b][/u][/center] [center][u][b]Coderz Needed.[/b][/u][/center] [center][url=http://www.awesomecoderz.java-fan.com][u][i][b]Awesome Coderz Team Forums[/b][/i][/u].[/url][/center] [center][u][b]Owner Is zomgs but my name is Javac on the forums![/b][/u][/center]
[b][i]What is the ACT?[/i][/b] [i]The ACT is a growing commuinty of forums. Our main aim is on Java programming but, we also have rs2 private server Boards![/i]
[b][i]Why are you posting this topic?[/i][/b] [i]Because i hope too get a team of coders too help me build our server![/i]
[b][i]Can i be a coder?[/i][/b] [i]Yes, fill out the form below and post it here, and then register on the forums.[/i]
[b][i]Do i have too register on the forums too be a coder?[/i][/b] [i]Yes.[/i] [b][i]why?[/i][/b] [i]So i can keep track and you can see what we need too do![/i]
[b][i]Jobs.[/i][/b]
[ul][li]Coding[/li] [li]Tester[/li] [li]Webmaster[/li] [li]Gmod[/li][/ul]
[i]These are the jobs which i need filling.[/i]
[b][i][u]Coding Form.[/u][/i][/b] [code] Name: How long have you been coding?: Link me to some of your work: Have you ever had a server?: If yes which one?: How would you rate yourself as a coder?: Will you be active on the forums?:[/code] [i]Please use.[/i]
[b][i][u]Tester form.[/u][/i][/b] [code] Name: Do you know how too find a bug?: Have you ever been a tester before?: Will you be active on the forums?: [/code]
[b][i][u]Webmaster Form.[/u][/i][/b] [code] Name: How good are you at Websites and Html?: Link me too your work: Will you be active on the forums?:[/code]
[b][i][u]Gmod form.[/u][/i][/b] [code] Name: Have you ever been a Gmod on a forum?: What would you do if you were Mod?: Why should you be mod?: Will you be active on the forums?:[/code]
[center][b][i]Before trying for any jobs please register on the forums and make sure your links are vaild.[/i][/b] [b][i]You must tell the truth.[/i][/b] [b][i]And once you start only i can let you go. if you go inactive you will be deleted and all your posts will be lost.[/i][/b] [b][i]We do not leech on the forums.[/i][/b][/center] [center]
[b][i][u][shadow=red,left]Staff Members:[/shadow][/u][/i][/b] [b][i]Zomgs[/i][/b]-[i]Owner.[/i][/center]
[center][b][i]Thank you, Zomgs.[/i][/b][/center]

item.title: Awesome Coderz Team.the ACT
item.dc:creator: @zomgs zomgs
item.description:
@zomgs wrote:

[center]Awesome Coderz Team![/center]
[center]Coderz Needed.[/center]
[center]Awesome Coderz Team Forums.[/center]
[center]Owner Is zomgs but my name is Javac on the forums![/center]

What is the ACT?
The ACT is a growing commuinty of forums. Our main aim is on Java programming but, we also have rs2 private server Boards!

Why are you posting this topic?
Because i hope too get a team of coders too help me build our server!

Can i be a coder?
Yes, fill out the form below and post it here, and then register on the forums.

Do i have too register on the forums too be a coder?
Yes.
why?
So i can keep track and you can see what we need too do!

Jobs.

[ul][li]Coding[/li]
[li]Tester[/li]
[li]Webmaster[/li]
[li]Gmod[/li][/ul]

These are the jobs which i need filling.

Coding Form.

Name: How long have you been coding?: Link me to some of your work: Have you ever had a server?: If yes which one?: How would you rate yourself as a coder?: Will you be active on the forums?:
Please use.

Tester form.

Name:
Do you know how too find a bug?:
Have you ever been a tester before?:
Will you be active on the forums?:

Webmaster Form.

Name: How good are you at Websites and Html?: Link me too your work: Will you be active on the forums?:

Gmod form.

Name: Have you ever been a Gmod on a forum?: What would you do if you were Mod?: Why should you be mod?: Will you be active on the forums?:

[center]Before trying for any jobs please register on the forums and make sure your links are vaild.
You must tell the truth.
And once you start only i can let you go. if you go inactive you will be deleted and all your posts will be lost.
We do not leech on the forums.[/center]
[center]

[shadow=red,left]Staff Members:[/shadow]
Zomgs-Owner.[/center]

[center]Thank you,
Zomgs.[/center]

Read full topic
